title: WEHI-SODA-Hub/spatialproteomics pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

run_backsub.errorMessage: Run backsub must be a boolean

run_mesmer.errorMessage: Run mesmer must be a boolean

run_cellpose.errorMessage: Run cellpose must be a boolean

tiff.errorMessage: TIFF file must exist, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tiff/.tif'

nuclear_channel.errorMessage: Nuclear channel must be provided as a single word without spaces

membrane_channels.errorMessage: Membrane channels must be provided as a colon-separated list without spaces

mesmer_combine_method.errorMessage: Combine method must be either 'prod' or 'max'

mesmer_segmentation_level.errorMessage: Segmentation level must be an integer between 0 and 10

mesmer_maxima_threshold.errorMessage: Maxima threshold must be a number greater than or equal to 0

mesmer_interior_threshold.errorMessage: Interior threshold must be a number between 0 and 1

mesmer_maxima_smooth.errorMessage: Maxima smoothing must be a number greater than or equal to 0

mesmer_min_nuclei_area.errorMessage: Minimum nuclei area must be a number greater than or equal to 0

mesmer_remove_border_cells.errorMessage: Remove border cells must be a boolean

mesmer_pixel_expansion.errorMessage: Pixel expansion must be an integer greater than or equal to 0

mesmer_padding.errorMessage: Padding must be an integer greater than or equal to 0

skip_measurements.errorMessage: Skip measurements must be a boolean
